Uses of Class
com.google.cloud.storage.Bucket

  • Packages that use Bucket 
    Package Description
    com.google.cloud.examples.storage.snippets  
    com.google.cloud.storage
    A client to Google Cloud Storage.

    • Uses of Bucket in com.google.cloud.examples.storage.snippets

      Methods in com.google.cloud.examples.storage.snippets that return Bucket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bucket StorageSnippets.createBucket(String bucketName)
      Example of creating a bucket.
      Bucket StorageSnippets.createBucketWithStorageClassAndLocation(String bucketName)
      Example of creating a bucket with storage class and location.
      Bucket StorageSnippets.getBucketWithMetageneration(String bucketName, long bucketMetageneration)
      Example of getting information on a bucket, only if its metageneration matches a value, otherwise a StorageException is thrown.
      Bucket BucketSnippets.reload()
      Example of getting the bucket's latest information, if its generation does not match the BucketInfo.metageneration() value, otherwise a StorageException is thrown.
      Bucket BucketSnippets.update()
      Example of updating the bucket's information.
      Bucket StorageSnippets.updateBucket(String bucketName)
      Example of updating bucket information.
      Methods in com.google.cloud.examples.storage.snippets that return types with arguments of type Bucket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Page<Bucket> StorageSnippets.listBucketsWithSizeAndPrefix(String prefix)
      Example of listing buckets, specifying the page size and a name prefix.
      Constructors in com.google.cloud.examples.storage.snippets with parameters of type Bucket 
      Constructor and Description
      BucketSnippets(Bucket bucket) 

    • Uses of Bucket in com.google.cloud.storage

      Methods in com.google.cloud.storage that return Bucket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bucket Bucket.Builder.build() 
      Bucket Storage.create(BucketInfo bucketInfo, Storage.BucketTargetOption... options)
      Creates a new bucket.
      Bucket Storage.get(String bucket, Storage.BucketGetOption... options)
      Returns the requested bucket or null if not found.
      Bucket Bucket.reload(Bucket.BucketSourceOption... options)
      Fetches current bucket's latest information.
      Bucket Storage.update(BucketInfo bucketInfo, Storage.BucketTargetOption... options)
      Updates bucket information.
      Bucket Bucket.update(Storage.BucketTargetOption... options)
      Updates the bucket's information.
      Methods in com.google.cloud.storage that return types with arguments of type Bucket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Page<Bucket> Storage.list(Storage.BucketListOption... options)
      Lists the project's buckets.
